name: Parahelp
headline: The AI support agent for fast-growing software companies
description:
Parahelp is an AI support agent for software companies.

Unlike other chatbots, Parahelp can resolve complex support tickets end-to-end, such as troubleshooting product issues and managing subscriptions, by following your policies and using your existing knowledge base, tools (like Stripe, Slack, and Linear), and API endpoints.

founders.description: Co-founder of Parahelp. I began programming at 13, where I also founded my first company. Throughout high school, I built consumer apps with my also current co-founder, Mads. Now, we’re building Parahelp - The AI support agent for software companies.

founders.description: Co-founder of Parahelp. Throughout high school, I built 4 consumer apps with my also current co-founder, Anker. Now, we’re building Parahelp - The AI support agent for software companies.

generated_description:
### Parahelp: Your AI Support Ally

**Overview**  
Parahelp, headquartered in San Francisco, is the brainchild of a small but ambitious team, currently comprising just two employees. Founded in 2024 and a participant in Y Combinator's Batch S24, Parahelp positions itself as a game-changer for fast-growing software companies.

**Mission**  
The mission is straightforward: to serve as an AI support agent that efficiently resolves complex support tickets on behalf of software firms. Unlike typical chatbots that often struggle with sophisticated queries, Parahelp is designed to handle intricate issues thoroughly, ranging from troubleshooting product issues to subscription management. 

**What Sets Parahelp Apart?**  
1. **End-to-End Resolution**: Parahelp can address support tickets from start to finish, seamlessly integrating with your existing knowledge base and tools like Stripe, Slack, and Linear. This means it can follow your established protocols and guidelines without the need for additional engineering work.

2. **Ease of Integration**: You can think of Parahelp as a teammate working within your current support platforms—be it Zendesk, Intercom, or Front—without adding any complex set-up overhead.

3. **Performance Tracking**: The AI’s reliability isn't just a claim; it’s backed by continuous evaluation. Parahelp constantly assesses its performance against your actual support tickets, ensuring it aligns with your procedures and consistently delivers quality.

4. **User-Friendly Management**: You can manage it like a regular coworker using Slack, enabling knowledge sharing and feedback without the hassle of intricate decision trees.

**Customer Experience**  
Feedback from users speaks volumes. Eli Winderbaum, Head of Customer Experience at a partnering company, marvels at Parahelp's performance, claiming, “I’m amazed at how indistinguishable the Parahelp agent is from a human agent.” This kind of reliability and human-like interaction is what makes Parahelp stand out.

**Get Involved**  
If you're interested in discovering how Parahelp can streamline your support operations, you're encouraged to book a demo on their website.  

You can explore more about them at [Parahelp’s website](https://parahelp.com/) and connect with them for opportunities at [Careers](https://parahelp.com/careers). 

In a nutshell, Parahelp aims to be the last support agent you'll need to hire, transforming customer support from a pain point into a seamless experience for both businesses and their customers.
